description: This release improves support for newer models in Amazon Bedrock Flows.
Adding support for ReasoningContent fields in Pre-Processing, Post-Processing and Orchestration Trace outputs.
This release adds Reasoning Content support to Converse and ConverseStream APIs
Documentation update, adding clarity and rephrasing.

Generate and use AWS-account-based endpoints for compatible services when the account ID is available. At launch, DynamoDB is the first and only compatible service. The new endpoint URL pattern will be ``https://<account-id>.ddb.<region>.amazonaws.com``. Additional services may be added in the future. See the documentation for details: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sdkref/latest/guide/feature-account-endpoints.html
